comments.body: I am wondering whether we should use `definitions` everywhere and only decide at call site whether `headOption` is enough. What do you think? Is there a lot of places that use it still? I am fine leaving as is, but just wondering how correct it is now.

Unfortunately, there are still a lot of places where it's used.

Initially, I thought that this fix will take less time than I already spend on it.
So, I would prefer to turn it into an issue - a kind of the second interaction of fixing wrong definitions. 

I think I will return to it after completing scala 3 related things.
Sure! Let's create a follow up to make sure that all places are properly handled.
